website_summaries.verdict: Consumers with small spaces or those who don't use a lot of sugar will appreciate this unique model, provided they don't mind refilling it frequently.
pros: Stands out for its unique design that features an attached bamboo lid
Bowl is made of quality ceramic and has a spoon slot with matching spoon
cons: Fairly small, as it only holds about a cup of sugar

customer_reviews.title: Great function!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for salt but it’s a perfect design; with the spoon and lid. I keep it next to my stove for cooking. It has a flat back so it stays flush against my backsplash. Really great container!
customer_reviews.author: LauraT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: It's adorable and I love the flip top lid. My kids like to take lids off and never put them back on so this was ideal. My 9 year old son said it looks like a toilet seat which is all I can see now but I love it. It is small and cute yet simple.
customer_reviews.author: Sadan

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my coffee bar
customer_reviews.text: Cute little sugar bowl with matching spoon. Comes exactly as pictured. Works great on my coffee bar. My only complaint is that if you close the lid without having the spoon in the little notch, sugar can spill when the spoon is flung up by the lid hitting it.
customer_reviews.author: BreeBear

customer_reviews.title: very happy with my
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely...I purchased two of them to use as a salt and black pepper containers...really cute and I appreciate having a spoon included with each...I plan to use the extended ceramic part on top for adding the words SALT and PEPPER with stencil...very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Functional and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a smallish container with a spoon for keeping cooking salt handy, and this is perfect. The shape allows it to minimize counter space. It's attractive and seems pretty durable. I want to get one for sugar also.
customer_reviews.author: Andy P.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone deserves a cute little sugar bowl!
customer_reviews.text: How could I have lived this long without a sugar bowl? Well, after coming to live with someone who takes sugar in their coffee, I decided to put the canister off the counter and replace it with a sugar bowl. Love it. Now I want another for my kosher salt. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a gift and the "getter" loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Kinkead

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to the counter
customer_reviews.text: I recently got this to sit out all the time next to the coffee maker and it is really beautiful. It doesn't feel delicate or breakable (which is a huge plus in my house).
customer_reviews.author: T. Hutchens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for someone who uses brown sugar every morning, and it not gentle enough for a lidded sugar dish. 😄. Seriously, well made and great looking on the counter. Perfect for what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: CF and HL

customer_reviews.title: We love it!  Even nicer in person.
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to find this cute bowl! I love the lid how it stays on and just flips up, so no chance of breaking it :) The wood is very slick and pretty. It is just the right size for the counter too. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Wanted easy to use sugar bowl that would not spill and an EASY to open lid. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Unbound

customer_reviews.title: Great little bowl and spoon
customer_reviews.text: Great little bowl and spoon, nice lid. Wish the hinge mechanism was a solid metal rod running the length of the back instead of two tiny screws but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Good size, looks amazing, comfortable in use.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't imagine anything better. Love it. Looks amazing, very attractive, perfect size. I love the fact that the lid is attached, so you don't mess with taking it off, and then covering it again. I ordered three - for salt, for sugar, and one extra, just in case.
customer_reviews.author: elina nostrant

customer_reviews.title: I think this sugar bowl is fantastic. It is just the right size and very ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this sugar bowl is fantastic. It is just the right size and very cute for the counter. At first, I wished the little spoon that comes with it was glass, but realized that it would probably break if it was. The plastic one at least is made to look like glass. I love the light and airy feel. I will be using it at a beach house and the wavy ceramic with the bamboo top feels beachy to me.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff G Buhn

customer_reviews.title: Screws get loose
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute & stylish sugar bowl and I loved the matching spoon, however, it had a major design flaw. The top is attached by small screws, due to use and lifting the top to get sugar, one of the screws was constantly getting loose & falling out. Maybe it was just my model, but it was a bummer, I’d always have to screw it back in with a small knife.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Courtin

customer_reviews.title: Great Sugar Bowl
customer_reviews.text: We love this sugar bowl - the hinged lid is convenient and makes it just that much easier to use and flip the lid back down on. We did end up using a different spoon that matches our other flatware but the spoon it came with worked perfectly well for the job. We've used it for several months and seems like it is holding up well, not to mention my husband still regularly comments how much more he likes it compared to our old sugar bowl. Great little bowl - highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Miss the old spoon...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these. Unfortunately, the first was knocked off the counter last week after nearly a year of use. I immediately ordered the same one to replace it. There is one difference though. The original has a ceramic spoon. This one is plastic. I preferred the look of the old one, and hate the use of so much plastic these days. This is why there is a four star review.
customer_reviews.author: A&B

customer_reviews.title: Arrived just as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Crock is whole with no product blemishes; bamboo lid is also whole and well made. I use this for salt instead of sugar and it works great. Really you could use this for almost any spice or ingredient, as long as you don't require it to be kept in an airtight container. This is absolutely NOT airtight so I don't recommend you store anything in here that you don't want being exposed to air.
customer_reviews.author: alqualonde

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and functional little container!
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this for my coconut oil container. It works just as well. I’m glad the it’s ceramic and bamboo so I know the coconut oil won’t “decay” it. It honestly makes a great addition to my cooking oil organization containers. I’m absolutely in love and am over the moon with the fact that there is a cute little spoon provided. All of it matches with my decor!
customer_reviews.author: Jannet

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our little office coffee bar because we only need a small amount of sugar out for occasional users. I love the wooden top and that the spoon is included. It doesn’t hold much-only a cup- so know that when ordering. I think it would also be good for gourmet salts. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Angela Im

customer_reviews.title: Great sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: A great little sugar bowl in our coffee area. The hinge is just a screw so it is kinda squeaky but I love the way it looks and the convenience
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Stylish kitchen addition
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my kitchen accessories. I got it as a salt cellar for my Maldon salt. It is beautiful, stylish and well made. The only drawback is that I was a little worried about the wooden lid when I washed it (by hand), but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Cute and useful
customer_reviews.text: I got this for someone who likes to cook a lot. The little wooden cover keeps any moisture out, and there is a nice little hole for the plastic spoon to sit in when closed. This was the perfect gift for a cook, as they can easily use one hand to lightly dust some salt or sugar onto their food. It was so nice that I later bought another one just for myself :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kim

customer_reviews.title: The measurements given are not correct. It will not ...
customer_reviews.text: The measurements given are not correct. It will not fit in the the top drawer of a standard kitchen cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: NoCorn

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for salt and it looks great next to the stove. It doesn't take up a lot of space on the counter, looks nice and it's easy to clean. Going to get another one to use for sugar to put next to coffee machine :-)
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fonkert

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Here's what I don't like about this dish, it's difficult to hold or grab to pull down from the cupboard. It's cute but not sensible if you have to transport it with your hands as it will slip out and break.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful container to display
customer_reviews.text: This salt cellar/sugar bowl is a very attractive piece to display while storing your specialty salts. The acrylic spoon is the perfect size for sprinkling salt on your foods to season it. I'm planning on enjoying displaying and using this salt cellar for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Catrina

customer_reviews.title: Space saving flat back sits nicely against cabinet wall.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this little sugar bowl! Love the hinged top and the sound it makes as it taps down. The spoon delivers the perfect amount of sugar to my morning coffee! My Sister saw it and loved it so I surprised her and had one sent to her home, she was delighted!! Thank you! Ps If you made a larger size, I’d buy that too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Fischer

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I liked the clean chic look of it and the fact that it has a lid. It’s really adorable for a monochromatic coffee station.
customer_reviews.author: Video Star

customer_reviews.title: Simple, attached flip up lid
customer_reviews.text: Simple, easy to clean (hand rinse), perfect for small counter space. I like the flip up so I can get sugar one handed. :)
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Nice little bowl
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice sugar bowl and exactly what I expected. It was a gift for someone. The only downside is that the spoon is plastic and not as nice as the bowl. Not a deal breaker though. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: KapFam3

customer_reviews.title: Cute and does the job
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sugar bowl. I was worried it wouldn’t hold enough but it holds plenty. The included spoon is way to small for us though.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon J.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a salt dish and it works great. I hate having things out on the counter so they need to be attractive and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Webster

customer_reviews.title: terrible hinges
customer_reviews.text: the hinge is just a small wood screw on either side, screwed into the bamboo top. it starts so tight the the whole bowl lifts when trying to open the lid. then the screws strip out the wood and it fails. disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzo Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Great product the only issue the screw is noisy and when the people assemble them in mine they put it way to far to the left not straighten I use for sugar and easy to clean. But a screw really! You need to replace it for something else that’s why giving 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: María Martínez

customer_reviews.title: Child torture device
customer_reviews.text: Nice little bowl, gave one to my girlfriend and one at my place so we think of each other when making coffee in the morning. My kids think that is so mushy and sappy and I just laugh and make smoochy faces :-) Dad 1 Kids 0
customer_reviews.author: Steve Deardorff

customer_reviews.title: Adorable sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: I just received this yesterday. It is such a cute sugar bowl. I'm not sure if the lid will hold up over time, but I guess time will tell. Overall happy with the product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Leena

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, good price
customer_reviews.text: Great size, love the bamboo lid and the flat back so it will sit snuggly against the wall beside my stove. Will be using for salt.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sellers

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The item works as intended, it has helped with the aesthetics in the kitchen. But being made of breakable material is a tradeoff that is worth it if you want something nice
customer_reviews.author: C9Poro

customer_reviews.title: Spoon is missing
customer_reviews.text: Spoon did not come with my order as noted it would
customer_reviews.author: Janice Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This very cute. It has a white ceramic body with a wooden lid. It also comes with a spoon for scooping...that is a bonus! Feels sturdy but when you open the lid it does made a sound hitting the tip of the ceramic bowl. This is not airtight if you are looking that feature. Overall this fits our need and I am very happy about it!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: this has to be one of my favorite things I have ordered.I use it for coffee creamer and I love it.Its made very well and looks good on the counter
customer_reviews.author: Debra F

customer_reviews.title: love my new sugar bowl.
customer_reviews.text: I think its cute. Love that it comes with its own scooping spoon. Only downside my family keeps joking that it looks like a mini toilet when the top lid is open. Its funny because its true. But i still like it alot. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product. Seems to be the correct size and best of all my dad cant drop the lid and break something. Also the included spoon was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Very functional yet elegant without being fussy. Easy to handle. Love the built in lid. If the spoon breaks, I have jam spoons to replace it. Looked at many, many sugar bowls. Very happy I chose this. My husband likes it too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Screw is almost all the way striped
customer_reviews.text: Defective item. Screw is not all the way in the wood and is coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Well made & Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the perfect bowl to put my Sea Salt hand scrub in. This is perfect! There is no mess because of the lid and the spoon gives the right amount. Does not take up space. Love it! My daughter's want one to put in their bathroom. So I will be purchasing more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Thexton

customer_reviews.title: Small, cute, and perfect to hold sugar
customer_reviews.text: I like that the bowl has a flat surface to go against the wall, it fits perfectly between appliances and also holds a decent amount of sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Garret Socha

customer_reviews.title: Functional, modern and clean
customer_reviews.text: I used this bowl for a local salt scrub that I like to keep in the bathrooms when people wash their hands. It looks so clean and cute! I’m worried the lid may not stay attached forever because the little screws may come out. But, so far so good. Great price for a multi use product!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Russ

customer_reviews.title: Love this cutie thing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little sugar container!! It’s super easy to use, super cute looking on my coffee cart shelf and my fam/teens/guests love it! It’s quite a noticeable little thing and people are always commenting on it!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Kray

customer_reviews.title: Is as described
customer_reviews.text: Nice little sugar bowl that does not take up a lot of space. Works perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: csten

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Cute and sturdy, fits the perfect amount of sugar, and fits right next to my keurig!
customer_reviews.author: BakingRaver

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Its cute, highly functional, holds at lot of salt/sugar. Very appreciative of the spoon and spoon notch design (just wish the spoon was a specific measurement and made of glass/ceramic/metal and not plastic), slight stiffness in the lid hinge and lid backstop. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful sugar bowl. Good quality. I love the attached lid and an opening for a spoon with a cute little sugar spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Quartieri

customer_reviews.title: Great sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: This came very well packaged. The lid is attached very well, unlike some other reviews mentioned. It is a great size and looks very nice on my counter. I did swap out the acrylic spoon that came with it as I have a small sugar spoon that I prefer to use. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MFM

customer_reviews.title: Cute but an issue
customer_reviews.text: Love the look but screwholes drilled haphazardly which causes screw to come unscrewed with opening and closing .. had to add glue to screw hole
customer_reviews.author: Rachael T.

customer_reviews.title: Great sugar bowl! Looks good and fits nice in our cupboard.
customer_reviews.text: Great sugar bowl! Looks good and fits nice in our cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: CyberCanvas

customer_reviews.title: DEEP but Small
customer_reviews.text: SO CLEAN AND SLEEK!! Product comes perfectly packaged, no cracks or scratches. I find this bowl convenient for my sugar next to my coffee maker. My favorite part is that it is deep, holds a lot of sugar, but does not take a lot of space on my counter. Would definitely buy more to hold salt&pepper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: very cute. Functional. and I love that one side is flat so I can push it up against the backsplash.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful design, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it is exactly what I was looking for, and makes a great addition to my coffee bar.
customer_reviews.author: Lovedliss

customer_reviews.title: Acrylic spoon??
customer_reviews.text: Product as described however they changed the spoon to acrylic and it looks really cheap. Will need to throw it away and get a separate spoon that looks nicer...kind of disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: In2Mac

customer_reviews.title: About the size of your coffee mug
customer_reviews.text: I was a little surprised at the size when I got the package. It’s smaller than I expected, so I have to refill it with sugar more often than I’d like for two people. Other than that, I really like it. It looks nice on the counter, the little spoon is the perfect size and it’s easy to use one-handed.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Cute little cellar
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! We use it for salt. I love the contrast of the white ceramic and wood - gives beach vibes. I only wish the spoon was a bit more sturdy...kind of wish it was wood to match the top. But very pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet_Tarte2

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Good quality, nice looking, convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana L

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Chic, Simple
customer_reviews.text: Cute, Chic, and Simple Sugar container . It goes with my kitchen decor and small enough to not take up space on my counter!
customer_reviews.author: Chyna Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love there is a spoon so you don't have to dip your fingers in and contaminate the salt.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works as a salt pot for kosher salt
customer_reviews.text: I got the dish to use for my kosher salt. The slot for the spoon is large enough to fit a regular table spoon, which might be necessary should the acrylic spoon break (it seems to be he most fragile part). It should fit my needs well and can fit nicely against my wall.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Planning to order another one. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I'm looking for. Placed it on the counter. It's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute and versatile
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute sugar bowl.for anyone and any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: So far, So good!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in perfect condition. As advertised. It goes great with my other spice wells that are bamboo. Have not had it for long is the reason for the 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kgray

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriends mom because I accidentally broke her other sugar holder and she loves this one!! She thinks it’s cute, and the spoon is a great added part about it. Great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needs
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to store ghee. The included spoon with the bowl works nicely and it also looks great in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Winston Kyu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sugar bowl, a must have.
customer_reviews.text: Love this sugar bowl. Great modern look and durable build.
customer_reviews.author: SKauser

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is just as pictured. Really cute and definitely glad I bought it, but not a very secure close.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna H.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Cute and sturdy. You can fit your hand in it for a pinch so perfect for salt or sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I really like the spoon that can stay in the sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and style. I use it to keep my Truvia in. I like it much better than your usual sugar bowl!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie king

customer_reviews.title: Functional and pretty sugar bowl!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store sugar cubes when I make coffee or tea. I like how the lid flips back and the container is flat on one side which I place on the counter against the wall. It is sturdy, cute, & functional!
customer_reviews.author: Henny

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Cute little sugar dish. Sturdy and well made. I enjoy the thoughtfulness that went into making the back side flat. Gives me options when placing it in my home. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ping

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and fits perfectly in our new house. We love the bamboo lid and the spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Product Review YouTube

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and petite
customer_reviews.text: I love the wood lid and how cute it is
customer_reviews.author: Lupita

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this new sugar bowl exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Lori Martin

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Classy Sugar Bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable and excellent craftsmanship. I’m buying more for gifts. Prompt shipping. This company is very impressive. I give 10 stars out of five!!!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this. It’s much easier to grab sugar for my coffee in the morning than pulling out a bag of sugar. And the little spoon was such a nice touch. Definitely satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle Bonnett

customer_reviews.title: You’ll love it
customer_reviews.text: I think the spoon should maybe be metal instead of a thick plastic but it isn’t flimsy and still works amazingly. I love love love this as my sugar holder.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: breaks after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: the screws fall off on the sides so the top no longer flips open. ive tried to fix it, screws continue to fall out after a few times opening. it is cute, though.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this in the mail, but already filled it with sugar and placed it in its spot. I really like this thing, it’s the perfect size and it’s nice looking and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Negron

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sugar bowl! It is so cute and modernized and extremely sturdy as well. I love the way it looks in my kitchen and I love using it every day. It is much better than my old sugar dish and for the price? you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Functions well.
customer_reviews.text: I love the easy opening top and the groove that fits the small ladle that comes with the bowl. I also like the shape of the bowl. When the lid opens it doesn't hit the wall like the other style bowl I bought that I don't use.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Cain

customer_reviews.title: Great bowl!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this after looking for something to match my kitchen Reno and BAM! Got this. I was worried about the depth since I didn’t want something bulky but enough to not refill every 2 day and this was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: joel beharry Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ceramic sugar bowl. Got exactly what i expected. Size is not too small or too big. Just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great size for keeping on the counter, not too big, not too small. The lid stays flipped up. The spoon is the perfect size but feels a little flimsy/plasticky. Over all, good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This work perfectly for what I was looking for. I wanted something pretty to sit on my counter for when I make my tea. The quality is great, it is decorative and functional. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christyne

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design, it is very practical, compact and just so comfy to use. Makes a great conversational piece.
customer_reviews.author: Fedyathecat

customer_reviews.title: Loose Screw
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this last July and one of three screws has consistently been loose and keeps falling out. I've tried to tighten it and it does not work. I will buying one that does not have a hinged lid.
customer_reviews.author: TMurray

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sugar bowl. I broke my favorite one and searched for more than a year to replace it. This one is better than my original!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best purchase ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sugar bowl. the size, design and the shape are perfect. Finishing is surprisingly good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Osni

customer_reviews.title: Sleek little sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: This little sugar bowl looks great on my counter! The white ceramic fits right into my kitchen and is easy to clean. Spoon fits well and lit seems fairly sturdy. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: yossi taubenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for! I am using it in the bathroom for a sugar hand scrub. It's pretty sitting out on my counter and is the perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. It is small but not too small. Love it. Packaged well and arrive in good shape. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie R

customer_reviews.title: Handy, cute sugar bowl!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our kitchen! Love that the lid is so easy to lift, and the opening for the spoon is very handy! Would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dorien A. Oliver

product_meta.title: Sugar Bowl, 77L Ceramic Sugar Bowl with Sugar Spoon and Bamboo Lid for Home and Kitchen - Modern Design, White, 8.58 FL OZ (254 ML)
feature_bullets: Actual Volume: 8.58 FL OZ (254 ML or 1 Cup). We carefully measured the ACTUAL VOLUME/CAPACITY of the sugar bowl to make it clearly for our valued customers like you, please CHECK THE PICTURES.
Perfect for home, hotel, cafe, buffet, party, etc. Suitable for serving sugar, pepper, spice, etc. Most chemical liquids, such as acids and bases, can be placed except hydrofluoric acid.
Elegant design, smooth appearance. The glamorous white porcelain will complement on any home decor. Perfect as a housewarming gift.
Made of ceramic, bamboo and food grade acrylic spoon. (The food grade acrylic spoon is more environmental-friendly, durable and not easy to break.) Easy to clean. Not safe for use in Microwave Oven.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars851 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
